Posts.Content: Dec 27, 2011 04:21AM marycecilia123 wrote: Had awful reflux on AC.  Constant coughing, burning,nausea, hoarse voice, had to sleep sitting up.  Took Nexium for months....now off the Nexium but am still careful about what I eat before bedtime, or lying flat.  It seemed to get better with time and being off chemo.
Posts.Title: Acid reflux with adriamycin+radiation? EnglishMajor marycecilia123
